prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon that resembles a large plant with vibrant colors and a strong presence.
I want a powerful Pokemon with a blooming flower on its back, showcasing a mix of green and pink.
Generate an image of a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of nature, complete with leaves and flowers.
Make a unique creature that stands out with a round body, large petals, and a sturdy build.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in lush environments with a large canopy of leaves above it.
Design a Pokemon with a strong connection to plants, featuring a colorful blossom on its back.
Show me a dual-type Pokemon that combines the strength of grass and poison with eye-catching features.
